Returns:

get

public Rational get(java.lang.Object o)
Translate other objects into rationals. Objects in the following classes are permissible:
  • Double
  • Integer
  • BigInteger
  • Rational
  • String in the form of integers, exponential or fractional representation.
If the argument is a rational, it is returned.

Specified by:
get in interface IRingElementFactory<Rational>
Overrides:
get in class RingElementFactory<Rational>
Parameters:
o - some object type
Returns:
the corresponding object of type RE
Throws:
InvalidOperationException - if the object is a String in an unknown format.
See Also:
IRingElementFactory.get(java.lang.Object)

Description copied from interface: IRingElementFactory
Returns a random value RE with distribution N(0, 1)
Note! Normal Distribution Issue

gaussianRandomValue

public Rational gaussianRandomValue()
Description copied from interface: IRingElementFactory
Returns a random value RE with distribution N(0, 1)
Note! Normal Distribution Issue
For the following RingElement types this method won't achieve the correct distribution: F2, FieldP

Returns:
random value RE
See Also:
IRingElementFactory.gaussianRandomValue()
